item.title: To Lua or Not to Lua
item.author: aben20807@gmail.com (Huang, Po-Hsuan 黃柏瑄)
item.description: Explore the transition to Lua support in Neovim configurations. Follow along as settings are tweaked and personalized, discovering plugin choices, themes, and the challenges faced along the way.
